content.sub_title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2023: From Zero to Expert!, Udemy.com, Online
content.description: Covers basics of JavaScript, from fundamentals like variables, functions, and objects to advanced topics like closures, prototypal inheritance, and asynchronous JavaScript. Also covers modern JavaScript features like ES6 modules, arrow functions, destructuring, and async/await.

content.sub_title: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & More: The Complete Bootcamp 2023, Udemy.com, Online
content.description: This Course covers full-stack back-end development, including Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Mongoose. Building applications using RESTful APIs, and server-side rendering using Pug templates. Advanced features such as authentication, security enhancements, data handling in NoSQL databases is also covered.

content.sub_title: Master Spring Boot 3 & Spring Framework 6 with Java, Udemy.com, Online
content.description: Overview of Spring Framework, in particular Spring Boot and Security, with a focus on building Web Applications and REST APIs as well as integration of React with Spring Boot. Gained valuable best practices and troubleshooting skills for Java Spring applications, underpinned by knowledge of contemporary tools such as Maven, Gradle, JUnit, and Mockito.
Comprehensive course on Java programming with a complete understanding of core Java development principles. The curriculum covers all aspects of Java programming, from the basics to advanced topics.

11 week course covering go to methods applied in supervised and unsupervised learning, the implementation in octave as well as topics like regularization and how to tackle problems like bias and overfitting.

content.sub_title: Intro to Machine Learning - Kaggle.com, Online
content.description: This course covered the basics of machine learning using python, giving an introduction into topics like data exploration, model building, model validation, under and overfitting and random forests.
Focused on enhancing data manipulation skills through coursework on the Pandas Python data analysis library.

content.title: Feature Engineering
content.description: Learned techniques in feature engineering for machine learning tasks, including mutual information-based feature selection, feature creation, clustering, PCA, and target encoding for categorical data.
